verses.verse: Come near <S%H7126><s%>, ye nations <S%H1471><s%>, to hear <S%H8085><s%>; and hearken <S%H7181><s%>, ye peoples <S%H3816><s%>: let the earth <S%H776><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%>, and the fulness thereof <S%H4393><s%>; the world <S%H8398><s%>, and all things that come forth from it <S%H6631><s%>.

For Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath indignation <S%H7110><s%> against all the nations <S%H1471><s%>, and wrath <S%H2534><s%> against all their host <S%H6635><s%>: he hath utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> them <S%H5414><s%>, he hath delivered them to the slaughter <S%H2874><s%>.

Their slain <S%H2491><s%> also shall be cast out <S%H7993><s%>, and the stench <S%H889><s%> of their dead bodies <S%H6297><s%> shall come up <S%H5927><s%>; and the mountains <S%H2022><s%> shall be melted <S%H4549><s%> with their blood <S%H1818><s%>.

And all the host <S%H6635><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> shall be dissolved <S%H4743><s%>, and the heavens <S%H8064><s%> shall be rolled together <S%H1556><s%> as a scroll <S%H5612><s%>; and all their host <S%H6635><s%> shall fade away <S%H5034><s%>, as the leaf <S%H5929><s%> fadeth from off <S%H5034><s%> the vine <S%H1612><s%>, and as a fading <S%H5034><s%> leaf from the fig-tree <S%H8384><s%>.

For my sword <S%H2719><s%> hath drunk <S%H7301><s%> its fill in heaven <S%H8064><s%>: behold <S%H3381><s%>, it shall come down upon Edom <S%H123><s%>, and upon the people <S%H5971><s%> of my curse <S%H2764><s%>, to judgment <S%H4941><s%>.

The sword <S%H2719><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is filled <S%H4390><s%> with blood <S%H1818><s%>, it is made fat <S%H1878><s%> with fatness <S%H2459><s%>, with the blood <S%H1818><s%> of lambs <S%H3733><s%> and goats <S%H6260><s%>, with the fat <S%H2459><s%> of the kidneys <S%H3629><s%> of rams <S%H352><s%>; for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> in Bozrah <S%H1224><s%>, and a great <S%H1419><s%> slaughter <S%H2874><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%>.

And the wild-oxen <S%H7214><s%> shall come down <S%H3381><s%> with them <S%H6499><s%>, and the bullocks with the bulls <S%H47><s%>: and their land <S%H776><s%> shall be drunken <S%H7301><s%> with blood <S%H1818><s%>, and their dust <S%H6083><s%> made fat <S%H1878><s%> with fatness <S%H2459><s%>.
For Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath a day <S%H3117><s%> of vengeance <S%H5359><s%>, a year <S%H8141><s%> of recompense <S%H7966><s%> for the cause <S%H7379><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%>.

And the streams <S%H5158><s%> of Edom shall be turned <S%H2015><s%> into pitch <S%H2203><s%>, and the dust <S%H6083><s%> thereof into brimstone <S%H1614><s%>, and the land <S%H776><s%> thereof shall become burning <S%H1197><s%> pitch <S%H2203><s%>.

It shall not be quenched <S%H3518><s%> night <S%H3915><s%> nor day <S%H3119><s%>; the smoke <S%H6227><s%> thereof shall go up <S%H5927><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>; from generation <S%H1755><s%> to generation <S%H1755><s%> it shall lie waste <S%H2717><s%>; none shall pass through <S%H5674><s%> it for ever <S%H5331><s%> and ever <S%H5331><s%>.

But the pelican <S%H6893><s%> and the porcupine <S%H7090><s%> shall possess <S%H3423><s%> it <S%H3244><s%>; and the owl and the raven <S%H6158><s%> shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> therein <S%H5186><s%>: and he will stretch over it the line <S%H6957><s%> of confusion <S%H8414><s%>, and the plummet <S%H68><s%> of emptiness <S%H922><s%>.
They shall call <S%H7121><s%> the nobles <S%H2715><s%> thereof to the kingdom <S%H4410><s%>, but none shall be there <S%H8269><s%>; and all its princes shall be nothing <S%H657><s%>.

And thorns <S%H5518><s%> shall come up <S%H5927><s%> in its palaces <S%H759><s%>, nettles <S%H7057><s%> and thistles <S%H2336><s%> in the fortresses <S%H4013><s%> thereof <S%H5116><s%>; and it shall be a habitation of jackals <S%H8577><s%>, a court <S%H2681><s%> for ostriches <S%H1323><s%>.

And the wild beasts of the desert <S%H6728><s%> shall meet <S%H6298><s%> with the wolves <S%H338><s%>, and the wild goat <S%H8163><s%> shall cry <S%H7121><s%> to his fellow <S%H7453><s%>; yea <S%H3917><s%>, the night-monster shall settle <S%H7280><s%> there <S%H4672><s%>, and shall find her a place of rest <S%H7280><s%>.

There shall the dart-snake <S%H7091><s%> make her nest <S%H7077><s%>, and lay <S%H4422><s%>, and hatch <S%H1234><s%>, and gather <S%H1716><s%> under her shade <S%H6738><s%>; yea <S%H1772><s%>, there shall the kites be gathered <S%H6908><s%>, every one <S%H802><s%> with her mate <S%H7468><s%>.

Seek ye out <S%H1875><s%> of the book <S%H5612><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and read <S%H7121><s%>: no one <S%H259><s%> of these <S%H2007><s%> shall be missing <S%H5737><s%>, none <S%H802><s%> shall want <S%H6485><s%> her mate <S%H7468><s%>; for my mouth <S%H6310><s%>, it hath commanded <S%H6680><s%>, and his Spirit <S%H7307><s%>, it hath gathered them <S%H6908><s%>.

And he hath cast <S%H5307><s%> the lot <S%H1486><s%> for them <S%H3027><s%>, and his hand hath divided <S%H2505><s%> it unto them by line <S%H6957><s%>: they shall possess <S%H3423><s%> it for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>; from generation <S%H1755><s%> to generation <S%H1755><s%> shall they dwell therein <S%H7931><s%>.
